testcaseName: Mixed OPV/IPV where # 3 is after age 4 and ≥ 6 months after previous dose. Patient Complete
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered a third dose of the Polio vaccine at age 4 years and at an interval of 6 months from the previous that the dose is valid.  No further doses of the vaccine should be forecast.  The series is complete.
reasonForChange:
v3.3: Changed test case to mark patient complete per updated recommendations from ACIP in January 2017.
v1.5:Rolled birth date forward to 2011 to ensure test was relevant to when ACIP recommendations were made.  Previous dates were before the ACIP recommendations were published.
